title: Again About the Project boarders. Need a RIOT admin in here please
body:
So I've completed ALL missions, including emote.
And I've played against countless people who had the hunters icon as well as bought the skin and I've yet to see ANYONE with the boarder?

replies.body: If you've unlocked the skin and the border, you should be good to go.  Keep in mind though, that those borders are specific to the their respective project skin and not all skins.
